title: Friends Ross and Rachel are still on a break according to Jennifer Aniston
text:
Ross and Rachel are on a break according to Jennifer Aniston (Picture: NBC)

Jennifer Aniston has weighed in on where Ross (David Schwimmer) and Rachel from Friends are now.

The actress joined Instagram in a big way by sharing a selfie with the reunited cast of Friends as her first post.

Famous fans of the sitcom have been celebrating her step into social media, including former Bachelorette star Kaitlyn Bristowe who asked the 50-year-old in the comments: ‘ARE YOU AND ROSS STILL TOGETHER!!???’

Jennifer replied underneath her comment: ‘Well we’re on a break’.

Kaitlyn shared their exchange on her own Instagram with the jokey caption: ‘The one where I s**t my pants.’

It was a reference to the season three episode The One Where Ross and Rachel Take A Break, where Rachel asks if they should pause their relationship for a bit following a row.

Ross sleeps with a girl soon after and when Rachel finds out they split up. However, Ross’s justification for his actions is that they were ‘on a break’ at the time, sparking a debate that lasted for the entire series and beyond.

In the last ever episode Rachel famously ‘got off the plane’ and came back to be with Ross, but maybe they aren’t each other’s lobsters after all.

This is either good news or bad news depending on whether you like Ross or think he is the absolute worst.

Since joining Instagram, the Horrible Bosses star has racked up over 11 million followers, racking up over 6 million in less than a day.

Other celebs who have welcomed Jennifer to the world of Instagram include Dolly Parton, Reese Witherspoon, and Ross actor David, who posted a pic of Rachel and Ross in Lego form to greet his former castmate, with Jen writing: ‘Hi Schwimmy!’
